Review Text: They are slow and sometimes forget what you ordered but they are always super nice. The food is good. Having food outside when is cold might not be the best idea, so better wait for a not so bad weather or book inside.

Name: Locals Coffee
Review Text: "We are closing at 16:00" is what we will remember from this place. They told us this 3 times within 20 minutes 30 minutes before closing time. We got the message loud and clear. The hot chocolate was hot but didn't taste like chocolate.

Name: Locals Coffee
Review Text: Place and service is nice but food is very disappointing and expensive for what you get. 2 tiny pieces of bacon = 3‚Ç¨. No sauce on the salad. But most plates dont even get salad. It‚Äôs just all a bit stingy on quantity and presentation.

Review Text: Locals coffee makes a really amazing coffee! They sell tasty croissants and pain au chocolat and then have a brunch menu.
